summary: Frontend-only code review for Companies page refactoring. All 9 features verified through static code analysis. CompaniesPage.jsx has 2 tabs (All Companies, Auto-Merge). Companies.jsx implements grouped industries with Outbound/Inbound blocks, pagination of 5, search filter, and industry edit modal.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Google OAuth required to access /focus/assets/companies. Testing requires authentication. The CompaniesPage component uses /industries-v2 and /unified-companies APIs.

1_only_2_tabs.notes: Only 'All Companies' (tab-companies) and 'Auto-Merge' (tab-auto-merge) tabs present. No Outbound tab.

2_outbound_inbound_blocks.notes: Industrias Outbound block (green, Target icon) rendered ABOVE Industrias Inbound block (slate, Inbox icon)

3_sorted_by_company_count.notes: sortIndustries() sorts by companyCount descending, with 0-count industries at end

4_accordion_per_industry.notes: AccordionItem with data-testid='industry-accordion-{code}' for each industry

6_search_filter.notes: Filters by name, domain, aliases. Input has data-testid='company-search-input'

7_hide_empty_industries_on_search.notes: renderIndustryAccordion returns null when searchTerm exists and companies.length === 0

8_edit_industry_button.notes: Pencil button in accordion header triggers openEditIndustryDialog(industry, e)

9_edit_modal_fields.notes: Dialog allows editing: name (Input), description (Textarea), color (color picker + text), classification (Select with inbound/outbound options)

authentication_note: Google OAuth required. Unable to perform live UI testing. Code review completed successfully.
